item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Saturday, March 1, 2025 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:

7. Inheriting is becoming nearly as important as working (369 points | 470 comments)
8. Certificate Transparency in Firefox: A Big Step for Web Security (102 points | 74 comments)

24. When eBPF pt_regs reads return garbage on the latest Linux kernels, blame Fred (93 points | 8 comments)
25. Show HN: Torii – a framework agnostic authentication library for Rust (67 points | 18 comments)
26. An update on Mozilla's terms of use for Firefox (483 points | 298 comments)
27. The serotonin theory of depression: a systematic review of the evidence (2022) (124 points | 96 comments)
28. Merlion: A Machine Learning Framework for Time Series Intelligence (150 points | 21 comments)
29. Surgery implants tooth material in eye as scaffolding for lens (133 points | 53 comments)
30. The Dino, the Llama, and the Whale (Deno and Jupyter for Local AI Experiments) (49 points | 11 comments)
